member.name: P:Geo.Rest.Domain.Models.Query.CollectionQueryParameters.Page
member.summary: The page of the collection, the default value is 1.

member.name: P:Geo.Rest.Domain.Models.Query.CollectionQueryParameters.PageSize
member.summary: The size of the page, the default value is 25, the maximum value is 275.

member.name: P:Geo.Rest.Domain.Models.Query.CountryCollectionQueryParameters.Language
member.summary: The two letter isocode for the language, optional, possible values: br, cn, de, es, fa, fr, hr, it, ja, kr, nl, pt.
